**Compensation Consultant - Senior**
==========================

**Government Tender Announcement**

**Reference Number:** cb-6435-38824772
**Solicitation Number:** 20230376 (Amendment 5)

**Publication Date:** June 21, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** September 1, 2023, at 14:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)

**Expected Contract Dates:**

* **Contract Start Date:** September 11, 2023
* **Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024

**Tender Status:** Expired (as of amendment date: September 1, 2023)

**Background:**

The National Security and Intelligence Review Agency (NSIRA) is seeking a Compensation Consultant - Senior to develop a pay equity plan to ensure equitable compensation for its employees. This requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders under ProServices E60ZT-180024 who have qualified for the Stream 8: Human Resources Services category.

**Description of the Requirement:**

The Compensation Consultant - Senior will be responsible for developing a pay equity plan to ensure that NSIRA's compensation practices provide equal pay to men and women for work of equal value. The consultant will work with the NSIRA Secretariat to analyze compensation data and identify areas for improvement.

**Tender Requirements:**

* **Selection Criteria:** The successful consultant will be selected based on a combined rating of technical merit and price.
* **Contracting Entity:**
	+ Name: National Security and Intelligence Review Agency (NSIRA)
	+ Address: P.O. Box 2430, Station “B”, Ottawa, ON K1P 5W5
	+ Contact: John Headon, Bids-Soumissions@nsira-ossnr.gc.ca, (343) 597-6323

**Notice:**

A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the original solicitation.

**Attachments:**

The tender includes the following attachments, which are available for download:
* Compensation Consultant - Senior RFP
* Compensation Consultant - Senior Amendment 1
* Compensation Consultant - Senior RFP 3

Note: All other information has been omitted for brevity and clarity. However, please ensure to review all attachments and the original solicitation to ensure you have a complete understanding of the tender requirements. 400 words have been taken, any excess has been omitted. APA Refer
